org.easybatch.extensions.hibernate

Class HibernateRecordReader<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.extensions.hibernate.HibernateRecordReader<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of objects this reader will read.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordReader

    public class HibernateRecordReader<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RecordReader
    Read records using Hibernate API.
